text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

name: ZibFluidBalanceFluidTotalOut
title: zib FluidBalance.FluidTotalOut
description: The total of fluid intake (e.g. by mouth, drip or tube feeding) in mL.
purpose: This Observation resource represents the FluidTotalOut concept (NL-CM:12.15.5) of Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) FluidBalance v1.0.1 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/FluidBalance-v1.0.1(2020EN)).

This does not apply to information from third parties, for example a medical terminology system. The implementer alone is responsible for identifying and obtaining any necessary licenses or authorizations to utilize third party IP in connection with the specification or otherwise.

element.comment: This Observation resource represents the FluidTotalOut concept (NL-CM:12.15.5) of zib FluidBalance. It can be used together with the [zib-FluidBalance](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-FluidBalance) profile on the Observation resource, which groups references to the current and other resources on `Observation.hasMember`.

element.definition: The time at which the measurement of the fluid balance was started.
The time at which the measurement of the fluid balance was stopped.
The total of fluid excretion (e.g. urine production, drain, watery defecation) in mL.
